LoginPage.c_h_description: Enter your email below to login to your account

RegisterPage.c_h_description: Enter your email below to create an account

LLMMemoryCalculatorPage.l_c_c_2_precision_tip: The precision of the model weights, lower precision uses less VRAM but may impact model performance
LLMMemoryCalculatorPage.l_c_c_3_batch_size_tip: The number of inputs processed simultaneously, affects KV cache and activation memory
LLMMemoryCalculatorPage.l_c_c_4_sequence_length_tip: The maximum number of tokens per input, affects KV cache and activation memory
LLMMemoryCalculatorPage.l_c_c_7_kv_cache_precision_tip: The precision of the KV cache, lower precision uses less VRAM, especially for long sequence models
LLMMemoryCalculatorPage.tips: Default enable Flash Attention and Page Attention optimization
